resources.string: Go learn with the real world
Arkademi uses augmented reality (AR) to show lessons in the real world, which you can view using your phone screen
Start browsing any topics you like so you can experience first hand the new way of learning using AR
Automatically download attachments for incoming emails
Only download attachments when manually requested

"Creating lessons in Augmented Reality (AR) is a long process and the development" "of new knowledge is getting faster than ever. With that, we would like to work with you. Yes, You!"

 	"Whether you are an educator, an artist, or even a high school student, we believe that you have what it takes to share your wisdom in" "the new and exciting platform of AR. Whether you want to share your insights about the greatest mysteries in History, or" "teach how to cook a new culinary recipe that you've created, then you can do that in Arkademi." 

 	"Every time you download an AR lesson, a pop-up ad opens. Arkademi employs a 80/20 split where-in 80% of the total" "ad revenue goes to the creator of the AR lesson. This is our way acknowledge every creator" "that took their time to impart their knowledge using the new realm of AR."
